oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cycloaddition of annulated cyclohexa-2,4-dienones and novel reduction of halogen at bridgehead: an expedient route to tetracyclo[6.5.2.0(2,7).0(9,13)]pentadec-2(7),11-dien-14-one and framework of conidiogenol and conidiogenone
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, V
SINGH, RB
MOBIN, SM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: lycopodium alkaloids
organic-synthesis
(+)-magellaninone
(-)-magellanine
magellanine
diterpenes
phenols
diels-alder cycloaddition
photochemical reaction
oxa-di-pi-methane rearrangement
spiroepoxycyclohexa-2,4-dienone
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An expedient route to tetracyclo[6.5.2.0(2,7).0(9,13)]pentadec-2(7),11-dien-14-one and tetracyclic framework of conidiogenol have been reported. Cycloaddition of annulated cyclohexa-2,4-dienone with cyclopentadiene, photochemical oxa-di-pi-methane reaction and a highly unusual dehalogenation of bridgehead halogen are the key features of our methodology. (C) 2009
